QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Active Sponsorship less than $39 No Matching RI Row Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Rate Increase Active Sponsorship less than $39 No Matching RI Row Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select r.ID , conSponsor.ID as SPONSORID , s.ID as SPONSORSHIPID , conSponsor.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID , conSponsor.[NAME] as SPONSORNAME , so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID , soc.[NAME] as CHILDNAME , sc.LOOKUPID as COMMITMENTLOOKUPID , r.LOOKUPID as REVENUELOOKUPID , r.AMOUNT , dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE.FREQUENCY from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc ON sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so ON so.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc ON soc.ID = so.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.CONSTITUENT conSponsor ON conSponsor.ID = r.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE on r.ID = REVENUESCHEDULE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS srs on srs.SPONSORID = conSponsor.ID left outer join dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL conAppeal on conAppeal.CONSTITUENTID = conSponsor.ID and conAppeal.APPEALID = (select ID from dbo.APPEAL where NAME like '%10555%') left join dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT ON dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.ID = conAppeal.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENTID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENTATION ON dbo.MKTSEGMENTATION.ID = dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.SEGMENTATIONID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENT on dbo.MKTSEGMENT.ID = SEGMENTID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE on dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE.ID = dbo.MKTSEGMENT.SEGMENTCATEGORYCODEID where (r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE = 2 -- recurring gift and s.STATUSCODE = 1 and r.AMOUNT < 39 and srs.ID is null and r.CONSTITUENTID NOT IN (select CONSTITUENTID from dbo.CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE where SOLICITCODEID = '5834E262-82B2-47E3-A5B2-DE02FB3DB62D') and dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE.[DESCRIPTION] like '%no increase letter%' ) -- no matching RI row
